S100E.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. CORPORAL OR TECHNICAN 5TH GRADE 4. SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 5. STAFF SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE 6. TECHNICAL SERGEANT, MASTER SERGEANT, OR FIRST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q2. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NO?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q3. IF YOU HAD A CHOICE, WHICH ONE OF THESE BRANCHES OF THE ARMY WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE I?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q4. WHAT MONTH AND YEAR DID YOU JOIN THIS DIVISIO? E. MONTH:  01. JANUARY 02. FEBRUARY 03. MARCH 04. APRIL 05. MAY 06. JUNE 07. JULY 08. AUGUST 09. SEPTEMBER 10. OCTOBER 11. NOVEMBER 12. DECEMBER 00. NO ANSWER E. YEAR:

S100E.Q4. WHAT MONTH AND YEAR DID YOU JOIN THIS DIVISIO? E. MONTH:  281 1. 1940 OR EARLIER 691 2. 1941 738 3. 1942 230 4. 1943 3 5. 1944 18 6. NO ANSWER 19 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 5A NOT CODED.
S100E.Q5B. ABOUT HOW MANY DAYS ALTOGETHER HAVE YOU BEEN IN COMBAT NOT COUNTING THE DAYS YOU'VE SPENT BACK OF THE LINE OR AWAY FROM THE FRON?  ANP (DAYS) X. QUESTIONS 5C AND 5D NOT CODED.
S100E.Q6. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME YOU WERE IN COMBAT WERE YOU A MEMBER OF THE COMPANY YOU ARE NOW I?  1. ALL OR MOST OF THE TIME 2. SOME OF THE TIME 3. LITTLE OR NONE OF THE TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q7. ABOUT HOW MANY BATTLE CASUALTIES (KILLED AND WOUNDED) HAS YOUR PRESENT COMPANY HAD SINCE YOU FIRST WENT INTO COMBAT WITH I?  1. MORE THAN HALF OF THE MEN HAVE BEEN CASUALTIES 2. BETWEEN A QUARTER AND A HALF HAVE BEEN CASUALTIES 3. LESS THAN A QUARTER HAVE BEEN CASUALTIES 4. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S100E.Q8A. HOW MANY OF YOUR PRESENT COMPANY OFFICERS ARE THE SAME OFFICERS YOU HAD WHEN YOU FIRST GOT INTO THE FIGHTIN?  1. ONE 2. TWO 3. THREE 4. FOUR 5. FIVE 6. SIX 7. NONE 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q8B. NOW THINK OF THESE COMPANY OFFICERS YOU HAD WITH YOU WHEN YOU FIRST GOT INTO THE FIGHTING AND WHO ARE STILL IN YOUR OUTFIT. ON THE WHOLE DO YOU HAVE MORE CONFIDENCE OR LESS CONFIDENCE IN THEM AS LEADERS IN BATTLE NOW THAN YOU HAD AT THE BEGINNING OF COMBA?  1. I HAVE MORE CONFIDENCE 2. I HAVE LESS CONFIDENCE 3. I HAVE ABOUT THE SAME AMOUNT OF CONFIDENCE 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q8C. AGAIN THINK OF THESE COMPANY OFFICERS YOU HAD WITH YOU WHEN YOU FIRST GOT INTO THE FIGHTING AND WHO ARE STILL IN YOUR OUTFIT. HOW MANY OF THEM DO YOU HAVE CONFIDENCE IN AS LEADERS IN BATTL?  1. ONE 2. TWO 3. THREE 4. FOUR 5. FIVE 6. SIX 7. NONE 0. NO ANSWER
S100E.Q9. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPAN?  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q10. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q11. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE IMPORTANCE OF THE RIFLEMAN'S JOB IN MODERN BATTL?  1. MORE IMPORTANT THAN MOST ANY OTHER SOLDIER'S JOB 2. IMPORTANT, BUT NO MORE SO THAN MANY OTHERS 3. NOT VERY IMPORTANT COMPARED WITH WHAT OTHER SOLDIERS CAN DO 0. NO ANSWER
S100E.Q12A. WHAT SORT OF TEAMWORK DID THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY SHOW IN ACTUAL BATTL?  1. VERY GOOD 2. FAIRLY GOOD 3. NOT VERY GOOD 4. NOT GOOD AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q12B. HOW IMPORTANT A PART DO YOU THINK YOUR COMPANY WILL PLAY IN WINNING THE WA?  1. A VERY IMPORTANT PART 2. A FAIRLY IMPORTANT PART 3. NOT A VERY IMPORTANT PART 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S100E.Q13. DO YOU USUALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NO?  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q14. WHEN YOU WERE FIGHTING IN A PARTICULAR BATTLE, DID YOU EVER HAVE THE FEELING THAT IT WASN'T WORTH THE COS?  1. YES, ALMOST ALWAYS 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 15A AND 15B TO BE CODED TOGETHER.

S100E.Q15A. DID YOU EVER HAVE ANY CONTACT WITH JAPANESE PRISONER?  Q.15B. HOW DID SEEING JAPANESE PRISONERS MAKE YOU FEEL ABOUT THE JAPANES?  1. I FELT ALL THE MORE LIKE KILLING THEM 2. I FELT THAT THEY ARE MEN JUST LIKE US AND IT IS TOO BAD THAT WE HAVE TO BE FIGHTING THEM 3. I DIDN'T HAVE ANY FEELING ONE WAY OR ANOTHER 4. SOME OTHER FEELING 5. YES TO PART A, BUT NO ANSWER TO PART B 6. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q16. WHILE YOU WERE AT THE BATTLE FRONT, DID YOUR LEADERS EXPLAIN THE WHOLE BATTLE SO YOU COULD SEE JUST HOW YOUR COMPANY'S PART FITTED INTO THE CAMPAIGN AS A WHOL?  1. AS MUCH AS THEY COULD 2. THEY COULD HAVE GIVEN US A LITTLE MORE 3. THEY COULD HAVE GIVEN US A GREAT DEAL MORE 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q17. WHILE YOU WERE IN COMBAT, DID YOU FEEL THAT THE TROOPS TO THE REAR, IN GENERAL, WERE DOING AS MUCH AS THEY COULD UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES FOR THE MEN WHO WERE DOING THE FIGHTIN?  1. AS MUCH AS THEY COULD 2. COULD HAVE DONE SOMEWHAT MORE 3. COULD HAVE DONE A GREAT DEAL MORE 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q18A. HOW ABOUT ATROCITIE? DID YOU PERSONALLY EVER SEE WITH YOUR OWN EYES A CASE OF JAPANESE USING METHODS OF FIGHTING OR TREATING PRISONERS WHICH YOU WOULD CALL DIRTY OR INHUMA?  1. NO 2. YES 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q18B. HOW ABOUT STORIES YOU HAVE HEARD FROM OTHER? DID YOU HEAR ANY TRUE CASES OF JAPANESE USING METHODS OF FIGHTING OR TREATING PRISONERS WHICH YOU WOULD CALL DIRTY OR INHUMA?  1. NO 2. YES 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q19. DID YOU RECEIVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING DECORATION?  1. PURPLE HEART 2. SILVER STAR 3. DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 4. PURPLE HEART AND SILVER STAR 5. PURPLE HEART AND DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 6. SILVER STAR AND DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 7. PURPLE HEART, SILVER STAR AND DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 8. NONE OF THE THREE 9. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q20A. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE SILVER STA?  1. ALL MEN I KNOW WHO GOT THEM REALLY DESERVED THEM 2. A FEW MEN I KNOW WHO GOT THEM DID NOT DESERVE THEM 3. MANY MEN I KNOW WHO GOT THEM DID NOT DESERVE THEM 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q20B. DO YOU KNOW ANY MEN WHO DESERVED SILVER STARS BUT DID NOT GET THE?  1. MANY MEN I KNOW DESERVED SILVER STARS BUT DID NOT GET THEM 2. A FEW MEN I KNOW DESERVED SILVER STARS BUD DID NOT GET THEM 3. NOBODY I KNOW DESERVED A SILVER STAR BUT DID NOT GET IT 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q21. IN GENERAL WOULD YOU SAY THAT BATTLE FIGHTING BECAME MORE FRIGHTENING OR LESS FRIGHTENING THE MORE YOU SAW OF I?  1. IT WAS MORE FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 2. IT WAS LESS FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 3. IT WAS NEVER FRIGHTENING 4. IT STAYED FRIGHTENING ALL THE TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q22. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS BEST TELLS THE WAY YOU WOULD FEEL ABOUT GOING BACK INTO ACTUAL BATTL?  01. I WANT VERY MUCH TO GET INTO IT AS SOON AS POSSIBLE 02. I AM READY TO GO ANY TIME 03. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO BUT IF I GO I THINK I WILL DO ALL RIGHT 04. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO BECAUSE I DON'T THINK I WOULD DO VERY WELL 05. HAVE DONE MY SHARE, LET OTHERS FIGHT 06. NEED A REST OR FURLOUGH FIRST 07. COULDN'T STAND IT - AFRAID - NERVES SHOT 08. PHYSICAL CONDITION 09. QUALIFIED ACCEPTANCE 10. REFUSAL (MISCELLANEOUS) 11. ALL OTHER 00. NO ANSWER
S100E.Q23. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSE?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 0. NO ANSWER
S100E.Q24. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARM?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S100E.Q25A. DO YOU THINK THAT THE EQUIPMENT OF THE AMERICAN ARMY IS BETTER OR WORSE THAN THE EQUIPMENT OF THE JAPANESE ARM?  1. ALL OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS BETTER 2. MOST OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS BETTER 3. OUR EQUIPMENT IS ABOUT THE SAME AS THAT OF THE JAPANESE ARMY 4. MOST OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS WORSE 5. ALL OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS WORSE 6. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S100E.Q25B. IF YOU THINK SOME JAPANESE WEAPONS ARE BETTER THAN OURS WHAT ARE THE?  1. NO JAPANESE WEAPONS ARE BETTER THAN OURS 2. SOME JAPANESE WEAPONS ARE BETTER THAN OURS 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q26. THINK OF ALL THE MEN IN YOUR PLATOON (OR EQUIVALENT UNIT) JUST BEFORE YOU WENT INTO ACTION FOR THE FIRST TIME. NOW THINK OF THE ONE MAN WHO HAD SERVED TIME THE MOST IN THE GUARDHOUSE. HOW DID HE DO IN ACTUAL BATTLE AS COMPARED WITH OTHER MEN IN THE PLATOO?  1. HE DID MUCH BETTER THAN AVERAGE 2. HE DID BETTER THAN AVERAGE 3. SAME AS AVERAGE 4. HE DID WORSE THAN AVERAGE 5. HE DID MUCH WORSE THAN AVERAGE 6. ANY OTHER ANSWER 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q27. HOW MANY OF THE NON-COMS IN YOUR OUTFIT ARE THE KIND YOU WOULD WANT TO SERVE UNDER IN COMBA?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q28A. HOW MANY OF THE OFFICERS IN YOUR COMPANY ARE THE KIND YOU WOULD WANT TO SERVE UNDER IN COMBA?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q28B. HOW MANY OF YOUR COMPANY OFFICERS ARE THE KIND WHO ARE WILLING TO GO THROUGH ANYTHING THEY ASK THEIR MEN TO GO THROUG?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S100E.Q28C. HOW MANY OF YOUR OFFICERS TAKE A PERSONAL INTEREST IN THEIR ME?  1. ALL OF THEM DO 2. MOST OF THEM DO 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM DO 4. FEW OF THEM DO 5. NONE OF THEM DO 0. NO ANSWER
S100E.Q29. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTIN?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S100E.Q30. DO YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR IN THE NEXT 25 YEARS OR S?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q31. AFTER THE WAR IS OVER, DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES WILL BE A BETTER PLACE OR A WORSE PLACE TO LIVE IN THAN IT WAS BEFORE THE WA?  1. WORSE AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 2. SAME AFTER THE WAR AS BEFORE THE WAR 3. BETTER AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q32A. WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR IDEA OF HOW HARD IT IS GOING TO BE TO BEAT THE GERMAN?  1. IT WILL NOT BE VERY HARD 2. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB, BUT OUR LOSSES WON'T BE HEAVY 3. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB, WITH HEAVY LOSSES OF MEN AND EQUIPMENT 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q32B. WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR IDEA OF HOW HARD IT IS GOING TO BE TO BEAT THE JAPANES?  1. IT WILL NOT BE VERY HARD 2. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB, BUT OUR LOSSES WON'T BE HEAVY 3. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB, WITH HEAVY LOSSES OF MEN AND EQUIPMENT 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q33. DO YOU THINK A SOLDIER WITH ABILITY HAS A GOOD CHANCE FOR PROMOTION IN THE ARM?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q36. DID SUPPLIES YOU MUCH WANTED OR NEEDED AT THE FRONT EVER FAIL TO REACH YO?  1. WE USUALLY GOT WHAT WE NEEDED 2. WE OFTEN DID NOT GET WHAT WE NEEDED 3. WE SELDOM GOT WHAT WE NEEDED 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q37. HAVE YOU LISTENED TO RADIO TOKY? HOW DID YOU FEEL ABOUT THE RADIO PROPAGAND?  1. YES, MOSTLY LIES 2. YES, MOSTLY LIES, BUT MAYBE A LITTLE MORE TRUTH THAN WE CARE TO ADMIT 3. YES, A LOT OF TRUTH IN WHAT THEY SAID 4. YES, NO ANSWER TO "HOW DID YOU FEEL" 5. NO 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S100E.Q38A. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE HAPPEN TO THE JAPANESE AFTER THE WA?  1. PUNISH THE LEADERS, BUT NOT THE ORDINARY JAPANESE 2. MAKE THE ORDINARY JAPANESE SUFFER PLENTY 3. WIPE OUT THE WHOLE JAPANESE NATION 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q38B. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE HAPPEN TO THE GERMANS AFTER THE WA?  1. PUNISH THE LEADERS, BUT NOT THE ORDINARY GERMANS 2. MAKE THE ORDINARY GERMAN PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY 3. WIPE OUT THE WHOLE GERMAN NATION 0. NO ANSWER P. THE OFFICE OF THE SURGEON GENERAL IS INTERESTED IN FINDING OUT FROM MEN LIKE YOURSELF WITH PROVED COMBAT EXPERIENCE, INFORMATION WHICH WILL AID IN SELECTION OF MEN FOR TYPES FOR COMBAT DUTY. WHATEVER YOU MAY THINK OF QUESTIONS 39-48 PLEASE ANSWER THEM SERIOUSLY AND CONSCIENTIOUSLY, AS THE INFORMATION WHEN THEY ARE ALL TABULATED SCIENTIFICALLY WILL BE VALUABLE.

S100E.Q39C. ARE YOU EVER TROUBLED BY YOUR HANDS SWEATING SO THAT THEY FEEL DAMP AND CLAMM?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q39E. DO YOUR HANDS TREMBLE ENOUGH TO BOTHER YO?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q39F. BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY DID YOU USUALLY GO AROUND WITH A BUNCH OF OTHERS OR BY YOURSEL?  1. I USUALLY WENT AROUND BY MYSELF 2. I USUALLY WENT AROUND WITH JUST ONE OR TWO OTHERS 3. I USUALLY WENT AROUND WITH A BUNCH OF OTHERS 0. NO ANSWER

MOST OF THEM SHOULD BE TREATED AS COWARDS AND PUNISHED 3. MOST OF THEM SHOULD BE TREATED SOME OTHER WAY 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q49B. DO YOU THINK THE ARMY TRIED HARD ENOUGH TO GET MAIL REGULARLY TO YOU AT THE BATTLE FRON?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q50C. WHEN THE GOING WAS TOUGH, HOW MUCH DID IT HELP YOU TO THINK OF WHAT WE ARE FIGHTING FO?  1. IT HELPED A LOT 2. IT HELPED SOME 3. IT HELPED A LITTLE 4. IT DID NOT HELP AT ALL 5. I DIDN'T THINK OF IT 0. NO ANSWER

S100E.Q50D. WHEN THE GOING WAS TOUGH, HOW MUCH WERE YOU HELPED BY THOUGHTS OF HATRED FOR THE ENEM?  1. THEY HELPED A LOT 2. THEY HELPED SOME 3. THEY HELPED A LITTLE 4. THEY DID NOT HELP AT ALL 5. I DIDN'T HAVE SUCH THOUGHTS 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S100E.Q50E. WHEN THE GOING WAS TOUGH, HOW MUCH DID PRAYER HELP YO?  1. IT HELPED A LOT 2. IT HELPED SOME 3. IT HELPED A LITTLE 4. IT DID NOT HELP AT ALL 5. I DIDN'T THINK OF IT 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 51A, 51B AND 51C NOT CODED.

S100E.Q51D. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY JO?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. IT DOESN'T MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 4. DISSATISFIED 5. VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER
